citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1041AM on
04/12/2016. Inspectors were able to get ahold of a facility representative. Inspectors were informed that no one
was available for inspection due to a sever medical condition of a family member.
Additional Inspectors
Neafsey Michael, Assistant Director

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1041AM on
04/12/2016.  Inspectors were able to get ahold of a facility representative.  Inspectors were informed that no one
was available for inspection due to a sever medical condition of a family member.
Additional Inspectors
Neafsey Michael, Assistant Director
